Package io.micronaut.security.rules

Class SensitiveEndpointRule

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.security.rules.SensitiveEndpointRule
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.micronaut.core.order.Ordered, SecurityRule<io.micronaut.http.HttpRequest<?>>
@Requires(beans=io.micronaut.management.endpoint.EndpointSensitivityProcessor.class) @Requires(classes=io.micronaut.http.HttpRequest.class) @Singleton public class SensitiveEndpointRule extends Object implements SecurityRule<io.micronaut.http.HttpRequest<?>>
Finds any sensitive endpoints and processes requests that match their id. The user must be authenticated to execute sensitive requests.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Sergio del Amo, James Kleeh
